thread.title: Gold Rises for Third Straight Session

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Gold Rises for Third Straight Session
text:
Gold prices rose for the third straight session Friday after new data showed U.S. consumer prices rose in December, a sign that inflation ended the year on a somewhat stronger note.
Front-month gold for January delivery climbed 1% to $1,323.40 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchangeâ€”its best day since November. Prices have risen in five straight weeks to their highest level since September, supported by a weaker dollar and investor bets on higher inflation. A dollar-denominated commodity, gold...
